collectible.title: Plumbob Necklace
collectible.subtitle: The plumbob appears above the actively selected sim...
collectible.text: The Plumbob is a recurring green crystal in The Sims series, primarily used to identify the current character that is selected and that the player can give commands to. It also shows their current mood based on color. Here's a necklace with a plumbob design that Bella Goth gave to you, telling you to always "Freebie wanno kabno, dobo."
collectible.unlock: Finish a game with Bella Goth.
